speakersYaml.name: Ian Zelikman
speakersYaml.biography:
Ian has been developing software professionally for over 15 years. In his career he has had the opportunity to work in various industries including healthcare and finances.
Ian has worked in various technology stacks including Python & Java, and enjoys most developing reliable applications with best practices and the right technology applicable for the challenge.

In his spare time Ian enjoys going on hikes in the Cleveland metro parks with his wife and 2 year old daughter and reading classic science fiction books.

talks.title: The Impact of Google v. Oracle Supreme Court Decision on the Software World
